sections.heading: Insurance; applicable only to insured's interest
sections.text: When the name of the party intended to be insured is specified in a policy, such insurance can be applied only to his own proper interest.SourceLaws 1913, c. 154, ยง 64, p. 423;R.S.1913, ยง 3200;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. IV, ยง 34, p. 602;C.S.1922,
